"Yo! Partner! Welcome back!": "I never doubted you, but wow... You really brought down a monster like that? You really are the best ARKS has to offer, no doubt!"
"Though thinking about it, I could tell you were a cut above the rest even back when we were doing our final training."
"You took on those Darkers without so much as flinching, while I was off to the side, scared out of my wits!"
"And then those times you helped me out with my investigations... Oh, and the time we both entered that Battle Championship!"
"And after that, saving Yuki and repelling those Dark Falz, not to mention fighting the [Profound Darkness] itself..."
"And now you're the Guardian, the face of ARKS! You're so much more than just my partner now, huh? Heheh. For all you've done... Thank you!"
"Hehe... Giving me that look kinda makes me worried that you're just kidding!"
"Wha--! Ouch, partner! You're just kidding, right?"
"You always keep a completely straight face when you're joking. Even when I know you're kidding, it still catches me off guard. Well, anyways..."
"Thank you for everything, really! Here's to our future... partner!"
